books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: The Times columnist extols personal virtues like kindness and honesty in a materialistic age.
books.name: THE ROAD TO CHARACTER

books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the American West; a companion volume to the Fox News series.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Kate Andersen Brower
books.description: Fifty years of White House lore, based on interviews with butlers, maids and other staff members.
books.name: THE RESIDENCE

books.author: by Henry M. Paulson Jr.
books.description: The former Treasury secretary and onetime head of Goldman Sachs discusses how American business and political leaders can work with China.
books.name: DEALING WITH CHINA

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war; now a movie.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II; now a movie.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995; now a movie.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Brian Grazer and Charles Fishman
books.description: The Oscar-winning producer describes the importance of curiosity in his life, and how others can harness its power.
books.name: A CURIOUS MIND

books.author: by Mary Norris
books.description: A memoir of a career in The New Yorker’s storied copy department, along with grammar advice.
books.name: BETWEEN YOU & ME

books.author: by Cokie Roberts
books.description: Women in Washington, D.C., during the Civil War.
books.name: CAPITAL DAMES

books.author: by Candice Bergen
books.description: The actress’s memoir discusses her marriage to Louis Malle and her work on “Murphy Brown.”
books.name: A FINE ROMANCE
